title: San Serif old fashion looking (french?) font desperately needed!
content:
Hi everyone,  
does anyone know this font? The one that says "ESSEN & TRINKEN"  
I'm in desperate need for it! Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021758im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Unbenannt-1_5466.png)

Font: 

 Estilo 

Solved By: 

 [Mike F](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021758/http:/typophile.com/user/3368 "View user profile.")
author: tmmykmprt

comments.content: [Estilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227021758/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/estilo/) using all lowercase. and one of the alternate ampersands.
THANK YOU!! You just saved my weekend. Thanks a lot!
